The one-time event Illithid Invasion is active across all servers! See here for more!

Clothing Jewelry

Helms
Gloves
Cloaks
Belts
Boots
Bracers
Goggles
Necklaces
Rings
Trinkets

Cloaks, mantles, capes etc.

You can wear a cloak in your back slot. They can be enchanted randomly with one of the Clothing enhancements or be one of the named drops found below. As of Update 40 (Oct '18), cloaks now have a cosmetic appearance.

  • Randomly generated cloaks created before Update 40 don't have a visual.
  • Randomly generated cloaks found afterwards have a random look; see possible combinations here.
  • All named cloaks have a distinct look: See list


Item Special Abilities ML Bind Quest Chest
Cloak of the Zephyr
  • InvisibilityInvisibility
    Caster level: 10
    Charges: 3 (3/day)     — 3 Charges (Recharged/Day:3)
  • BlurryBlurry: Equipping this item causes you to become slightly blurry. Attacks from enemies have a 20% chance to miss you due to concealment.
  • Invisibility GuardInvisibility Guard: This item has a chance of granting you temporary invisibility when you are hit by foes. The invisibility will not be removed when you attack or take damage, but it will wear off after 10 seconds.
  • Lightning Lore +12%Lightning Lore +12: Passive: Your Electricity spells gain a 12% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Magnetism +80Magnetism +80: Passive: +80 Equipment bonus to Electricity Spell Power.
  • The Desert's Writhing StormThe Desert's Writhing Storm: 2 Pieces Equipped:
    +2% Artifact bonus to Electric Spellcrit Chance
    +10 Artifact bonus to Electric Spellpower
    +10 Artifact bonus to Magical Resistance Rating
 11 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Zawabi's Revenge Raid Warded Chest
Moss Weave Cloak
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • Fortitude Save +3 Fortitude Save +3: This item gives a +3 Resistance bonus to your Fortitude saves.
 3 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Lost Seekers
Witchdoctor's Mantle
  • Will Save +2 Will Save +2: This item gives a +2 Resistance bonus to your Will saves.
  • Power IIPower II: This item grants the wearer +20 maximum spell points. Favored Souls and Sorcerers gain double spell points from this item.
 None Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Seal of Shan-To-Kor
Hellfire Cloak
  • Fire Resistance +17Fire Resistance +17: Passive: +17 Enhancement bonus to your Fire Resistance.
  • Cold Resistance +17Cold Resistance +17: Passive: +17 Enhancement bonus to your Cold Resistance.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

Cloak of the Asylum
  • Will Save +3 Will Save +3: This item gives a +3 Resistance bonus to your Will saves.
  • Magical Sheltering +5 Magical Sheltering +5: +5 Enhancement bonus to Magical Resistance Rating
  • Colorless Augment Slot: EmptyColorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1

 3 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Setting the Wards: The Patriarchs' Crypt Marguerite chest (where talk to Marguerite before chase)
Wretched Twilight
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • Nullification +72Nullification +72: Passive: +72 Equipment bonus to Negative (Necrotic) and Poison Spell Power.
  • Stealth StrikeStealth Strike: Reduces the threat generated by ranged attacks and spells by 15%.
  • Sneak Attack Bonus +4Sneak Attack Bonus +4: Provides a +4 to attack bonus and a +6 to damage for any attack that would qualify as a Sneak Attack, even if the wielder is not a Rogue.
  • Upgradeable Item (Black Abbot)Upgradeable Item (Black Abbot): This item could be upgraded if you found a Seal of the Black Abbot to combine it with. Bring this item to the Fountain of Necrotic Might outside the Black Mausoleum and combine it with a Seal of the Black Abbot to upgrade the item to a more powerful form.
 13 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Ascension Chamber Raid Warded chest

  • RegrowthRegrowth
    Caster level: 1
    Charges: 1 (1/day)     — 1 Charges (Recharged/Day:1)
  • Hide +10Hide +10: Passive: +10 Competence bonus to the Hide skill.

Stormreaver's Napkin
  • Intelligence +6 Intelligence +6: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
  • Spell Focus I Spell Focus I: +1 Equipment bonus to the DC of all spells.
  • Upgradeable Item (Stormreaver)Upgradeable Item (Stormreaver): This item could be upgraded if you found a Seal of the Stormreaver to combine it with. Bring this item to the Stormreaver Monument in Gianthold and combine it with a Seal of the Stormreaver to upgrade the item to a more powerful form.
 13 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire The Reaver's Fate Raid Warded chest

Cape of the Roc
  • Roc's StrengthRoc's Strength
    Caster level: 8
    Charges: 3 (3/day)     — 3 Charges (Recharged/Day:3)
  • Feather FallingFeather Falling: This item is engraved with feathers and bestows a powerful magical effect. Whenever the wearer begins to fall from any height, this effect slows the descent dramatically, causing the wearer to fall like a feather.
  • Strength +6 Strength +6: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Insightful Strength +2Insightful Strength +2: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +2 insight bonus to Strength.
  • Speed +21% Speed +21%: +21% enhancement bonus to movement speed, 8% bonus to attack speed.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments

Cloak of Curses
  • Chaotic CurseChaotic Curse: The curse on this item is so powerful it can be transferred to any creature that dares touch the wearer. The rents in the fabric of the underlying cloth has made the curse unstable and it can reverse itself. Note especially that while the wearer is partially shielded he is not entirely immune to this effect.
  • Enchantment Focus I Enchantment Focus I: +1 Equipment bonus to the DC of Enchantment spells.
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

Cloak of Ice
  • Fire Shield (Cold)Fire Shield (Cold): When you are successfully attacked, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield (Cold) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield (Hot) from another item source, they will nullify each-other.
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments

  • InvisibilityInvisibility
    Caster level: 3
    Charges: 1 (1/day)     — 1 Charges (Recharged/Day:1)
  • Invisibility (Protection +2Protection +2: Passive: +2 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.)
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

 4 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Partycrashers Rest Room chest; End chest
Cloak of Night (level 16)
  • Invisibility GuardInvisibility Guard: This item has a chance of granting you temporary invisibility when you are hit by foes. The invisibility will not be removed when you attack or take damage, but it will wear off after 10 seconds.
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • DeathblockDeathblock: The wearer of this item is immune to all death spells and magical death effects.
  • Nightmare GuardNightmare Guard: This item has a chance to terrorizing foes that hit you, applying a Mind Thrust effect, when you are hit by them (dealing 5d8 force damage, Will save vs. Enchantments negates). It may also expose your foes to their greatest fears, acting as a Phantasmal Killer spell.
  • Dodge +2% Dodge +2%: +2% Enhancement bonus to Dodge.
 16 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Night Revels

  • Invisibility GuardInvisibility Guard: This item has a chance of granting you temporary invisibility when you are hit by foes. The invisibility will not be removed when you attack or take damage, but it will wear off after 10 seconds.
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • DeathblockDeathblock: The wearer of this item is immune to all death spells and magical death effects.
  • Nightmare GuardNightmare Guard: This item has a chance to terrorizing foes that hit you, applying a Mind Thrust effect, when you are hit by them (dealing 5d8 force damage, Will save vs. Enchantments negates). It may also expose your foes to their greatest fears, acting as a Phantasmal Killer spell.
  • Dodge +4% Dodge +4%: +4% Enhancement bonus to Dodge.
  • DRDamage Reduction 5/Good: Reduces physical damage by 5, except from Good attacks. 5/Good

  • Poison GuardPoison Guard: This item carries a potent venom that may be contracted by enemies that hit you, dealing 1d6 Strength damage. A successful Fortitude Save (DC 20) will negate this effect.
  • Constitution +4 Constitution +4: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
  • Proof Against Poison +3 Proof Against Poison +3: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. Epic Envenomed Cloak
  • Greater Poison GuardGreater Poison Guard: This item carries a potent venom that may be contracted by enemies that hit you, dealing 2d6 Strength damage. A successful Fortitude Save (DC 28) will negate this effect.
  • Constitution +9 Constitution +9: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +9 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
  • Resistance +8 Resistance +8: Passive: +8 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
  • Proof Against Poison +8 Proof Against Poison +8: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +8 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 9 + their Fortitude save).

Cloak of Night (level 24)
  • Invisibility GuardInvisibility Guard: This item has a chance of granting you temporary invisibility when you are hit by foes. The invisibility will not be removed when you attack or take damage, but it will wear off after 10 seconds.
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • DeathblockDeathblock: The wearer of this item is immune to all death spells and magical death effects.
  • Nightmare GuardNightmare Guard: This item has a chance to terrorizing foes that hit you, applying a Mind Thrust effect, when you are hit by them (dealing 5d8 force damage, Will save vs. Enchantments negates). It may also expose your foes to their greatest fears, acting as a Phantasmal Killer spell.
  • Dodge +6% Dodge +6%: +6% Enhancement bonus to Dodge.
  • DRDamage Reduction 10/Good: Reduces physical damage by 10, except from Good attacks. 10/Good

  • Resistance +6 Resistance +6: Passive: +6 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • DRDamage Reduction 10/Evil: Reduces physical damage by 10, except from Evil attacks. 10/Evil

    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

    • Search +20Search +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Search skill.
    • Spellcraft +20Spellcraft +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Spellcraft skill.
    • Spot +20Spot +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Spot skill.
    • Wizardry XWizardry X: This item grants the wearer +250 maximum spell points. Sorcerers and Favored Souls gain up to double spell points from items.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

A Break In the Ice, What Goes Up , End chest
Prismatic Cloak, Violet (Level 28)
  • Electric Absorption +30% Electric Absorption +30%: Passive: 30% Enhancement Bonus to Electric Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • One of the following:
    • Accuracy X Accuracy X: Passive: +10 Competence bonus to attack rolls
    • Bluff +20Bluff +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Bluff skill.

    • Resistance +10 Resistance +10: Passive: +10 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.

    • Listen +20Listen +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Listen skill.,
    • Natural Armor +10Natural Armor +10: Passive: +10 Natural Armor Bonus to Armor Class.
    • Resistance +10 Resistance +10: Passive: +10 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
    • Search +20Search +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Search skill.

    • Wizardry XWizardry X: This item grants the wearer +250 maximum spell points. Sorcerers and Favored Souls gain up to double spell points from items.

    • Named: Category:Green augments

    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)

A Break In the Ice, What Goes Up (Heroic Normal), End chest
Epic Cloak of Ice
  • Cold Resistance +40Cold Resistance +40: Passive: +40 Enhancement bonus to your Cold Resistance.
  • Fire Shield (Cold)Fire Shield (Cold): When you are successfully attacked, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield (Cold) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield (Hot) from another item source, they will nullify each-other.
  • Fire Shield (Cold) Miss-GuardFire Shield (Cold) Miss-Guard: When you are missed, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield (Cold) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield (Hot) from another source, they will nullify each other.
  • Freezing Ice Freezing Ice:
    • On items: While you are wearing this item, your melee, ranged, and unarmed attacks gain the Freezing Ice ability. (When the weapon is used, an icy power occasionally comes to the surface, attempting to freeze an enemy solid and encase them in ice.) - (duration: 9 seconds)
    • On weapons: This Weapon stores the pitiless immovable power of the ice deep within. When this weapon is used, this power occasionally comes to the surface, attempting to freeze an enemy solid and encase them in ice.
  • Upgradeable - Primary AugmentUpgradeable - Primary Augment: This item can be upgraded to contain a Yellow, Blue or Red (weapons and shields only) augment. Hide of the Fallen
  • Druidic Survival MasteryDruidic Survival Mastery: While in Wild Shape, you receive a Primal bonus to damage equal to half the number of Wilderness Lore feats you have.
  • Shield +2Shield +2: While this item is equipped, you are partially protected by a field of magical force which can deflect enemy attacks. This item provides a +2 Shield bonus to Armor Class. It does not stack with an equipped shield.
  • Armor-Piercing - 10% Armor-Piercing - 10%: Passive: +10% Enhancement bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)
  • Strength +6 Strength +6: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Strength.

  • Legendary Taint of ShavarathLegendary Taint of Shavarath: Green Steel items thirst for pain and suffering. While weapons feed their bloodlust on enemies, accessories and clothing cannot. Wearing multiple items that bear the Legendary Taint of Shavarath creates dangerous imbalances of energy as the items feed more and more upon the wielder. Perhaps there is a way to appease this item...

Cloak of the Mimic (Level 28)
  • Sticky Goo GuardSticky Goo Guard: This item has a chance of encasing a creature in sticky goo, much like an attack of a mimic. It reduces the creatures move speed and attack speed.
  • DeathblockDeathblock: The wearer of this item is immune to all death spells and magical death effects.
  • Fortification +139%Fortification +139%: +139% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Physical Sheltering +32 Physical Sheltering +32: +32 Enhancement bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
  • DRDamage Reduction 15/Lawful: Reduces physical damage by 15, except from Lawful attacks. 15/Lawful
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments

Cloak of Night (level 28)
  • Invisibility GuardInvisibility Guard: This item has a chance of granting you temporary invisibility when you are hit by foes. The invisibility will not be removed when you attack or take damage, but it will wear off after 10 seconds.
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • DeathblockDeathblock: The wearer of this item is immune to all death spells and magical death effects.
  • Nightmare GuardNightmare Guard: This item has a chance to terrorizing foes that hit you, applying a Mind Thrust effect, when you are hit by them (dealing 5d8 force damage, Will save vs. Enchantments negates). It may also expose your foes to their greatest fears, acting as a Phantasmal Killer spell.
  • Dodge +12% Dodge +12%: +12% Enhancement bonus to Dodge.
  • DRDamage Reduction 15/Good: Reduces physical damage by 15, except from Good attacks. 15/Good
 28 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Night Revels

The Invisible Cloak of Strahd
  • Invisibility GuardInvisibility Guard: This item has a chance of granting you temporary invisibility when you are hit by foes. The invisibility will not be removed when you attack or take damage, but it will wear off after 10 seconds.
  • Nightmare GuardNightmare Guard: This item has a chance to terrorizing foes that hit you, applying a Mind Thrust effect, when you are hit by them (dealing 5d8 force damage, Will save vs. Enchantments negates). It may also expose your foes to their greatest fears, acting as a Phantasmal Killer spell.
  • Deception +11 Deception +11: +11 Enhancement bonus to hit and +17 to damage for any hit that would qualify as a sneak attack.
  • Magical Sheltering +34 Magical Sheltering +34: +34 Enhancement bonus to Magical Resistance Rating

  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

Prismatic Cloak, Red (Level 17)
  • Fire Absorption +16% Fire Absorption +16%: Passive: 16% Enhancement Bonus to Fire Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • One of the following:
    • Accuracy VI Accuracy VI: Passive: +6 Competence bonus to attack rolls
    • Bluff +13Bluff +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Bluff skill.
    • Concentration +13Concentration +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Concentration skill.
    • Diplomacy +13Diplomacy +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Diplomacy skill.
    • Haggle +13Haggle +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Haggle skill.
    • Heal +13Heal +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Heal skill.
    • Intimidate +13Intimidate +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Intimidate skill.
    • Listen +13Listen +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Listen skill.
    • Natural Armor +6Natural Armor +6: Passive: +6 Natural Armor Bonus to Armor Class.
    • Resistance +6 Resistance +6: Passive: +6 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
    • Search +13Search +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Search skill.
    • Spellcraft +13Spellcraft +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Spellcraft skill.
    • Spot +13Spot +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Spot skill.
    • Wizardry VIWizardry VI: This item grants the wearer +150 maximum spell points. Sorcerers and Favored Souls gain up to double spell points from items.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

A Break In the Ice, What Goes Up (Heroic Hard), End chest
Prismatic Cloak, Violet (Level 17)
  • Electric Absorption +16% Electric Absorption +16%: Passive: 16% Enhancement Bonus to Electric Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • One of the following:
    • Accuracy VI Accuracy VI: Passive: +6 Competence bonus to attack rolls
    • Bluff +13Bluff +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Bluff skill.
    • Concentration +13Concentration +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Concentration skill.

    • Haggle +13Haggle +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Haggle skill.

    • Listen +13Listen +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Listen skill.
    • Natural Armor +6Natural Armor +6: Passive: +6 Natural Armor Bonus to Armor Class.
    • Resistance +6 Resistance +6: Passive: +6 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
    • Search +13Search +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Search skill.
    • Spellcraft +13Spellcraft +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Spellcraft skill.
    • Spot +13Spot +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Spot skill.

  • Insightful Charisma +6Insightful Charisma +6: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +6 insight bonus to Charisma.

Cloak of the Mimic (Level 12)
  • Sticky Goo GuardSticky Goo Guard: This item has a chance of encasing a creature in sticky goo, much like an attack of a mimic. It reduces the creatures move speed and attack speed.
  • DeathblockDeathblock: The wearer of this item is immune to all death spells and magical death effects.
  • Fortification +84%Fortification +84%: +84% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Physical Sheltering +16 Physical Sheltering +16: +16 Enhancement bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
  • DRDamage Reduction 5/Lawful: Reduces physical damage by 5, except from Lawful attacks. 5/Lawful

    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments

    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)

    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%

    • Accuracy: +2 to +22

Black Velvet Capelet
  • Insightful Negative Amplification +15Negative Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming negative energy healing by +15 (Insight bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • Profane Well Rounded +1Profane Well Rounded +1: +1 profane bonus to all abilities.
  • Intelligence +8 Intelligence +8: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +8 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
  • Boon of UndeathBoon of Undeath: Undead take solace in the hate of others. Every time a character wearing a Boon of Undeath item is struck in combat, an Inflict Light Wounds spell will be cast on the character.

Hallowed Trail
  • Radiance +94Radiance +94: Passive: +94 Equipment bonus to Light and Alignment Spell Power.
  • Radiance Lore +14%Radiance Lore +14: Passive: Your Light and Aligned spells gain a 14% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Evocation Focus +3 Evocation Focus +3: +3 Equipment bonus to the DC of Evocation spells.
  • Quality Spell Penetration +2Quality Spell Penetration +2: Passive: +2 Quality bonus to Spell Penetration checks.

    • Named: Category:Blue augments

    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

    +25 Artifact bonus to Fire, Force, Light and Positive Spell Power
    +5% Artifact bonus to Fire, Force, Light and Positive Spell Crit Chance
    +2 Artifact bonus to Wisdom and Charisma
    +1 Artifact bonus to Spell DCs

      • Quality Constitution +3Quality Constitution +3: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +3 quality bonus to Constitution.
  • Freedom of MovementFreedom of Movement: This item grants its wearer the ability to move and attack normally while under the influence of magic that impedes movement, such as paralysis, solid fog, slow and web.

    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%

    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57

    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action

Mantle of Aosu'riel
  • Speed +22% Speed +22%: +22% enhancement bonus to movement speed, 9% bonus to attack speed.
  • Charisma +6 Charisma +6: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
  • Parrying +2Parrying +2: +2 Insight bonus to Armor Class, +2 Insight bonus to Saves.
  • Dodge +6% Dodge +6%: +6% Enhancement bonus to Dodge.
  • Feather FallingFeather Falling: This item is engraved with feathers and bestows a powerful magical effect. Whenever the wearer begins to fall from any height, this effect slows the descent dramatically, causing the wearer to fall like a feather.
  • Blue Augment Slot: EmptyBlue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%

Legendary Envenomed Cloak
  • Greater Poison GuardGreater Poison Guard: This item carries a potent venom that may be contracted by enemies that hit you, dealing 2d6 Strength damage. A successful Fortitude Save (DC 28) will negate this effect.
  • Constitution +14 Constitution +14: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +14 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
  • Resistance +11 Resistance +11: Passive: +11 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
  • Proof Against Poison +11 Proof Against Poison +11: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +11 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 12 + their Fortitude save).

Legendary Cloak of the Zephyr
  • InvisibilityInvisibility
    Caster level: 30
    Charges: 5 (5/day)     — 5 Charges (Recharged/Day:5)
  • BlurryBlurry: Equipping this item causes you to become slightly blurry. Attacks from enemies have a 20% chance to miss you due to concealment.
  • Invisibility GuardInvisibility Guard: This item has a chance of granting you temporary invisibility when you are hit by foes. The invisibility will not be removed when you attack or take damage, but it will wear off after 10 seconds.
  • Lightning Lore +22%Lightning Lore +22: Passive: Your Electricity spells gain a 22% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Magnetism +151Magnetism +151: Passive: +151 Equipment bonus to Electricity Spell Power.
  • Lightning Storm GuardLightning Storm Guard: This item stores the power of a volatile thunderstorm deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this dynamic power occasionally comes to the surface, devastating enemies with a massive lightning strike.
  • Blue Augment Slot: EmptyBlue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments

Aral'Aul'Nevae's Hide
  • Subtle TargetSubtle Target: Once per minute, when you use Diplomacy, you gain a -100% Profane bonus to threat generation with weapon strikes for 20 seconds.
  • Improved Deception +9Improved Deception: This item makes your weapons hard to focus upon and thus provides a +9 enhancement bonus to Bluff checks. In addition, while using this item your weapons have a chance to envelop the target in darkness, making them vulnerable to sneak attacks for a short time.
  • Diversion +7% Diversion +7%: +7% Enhancement bonus to decreased threat generated from melee damage.
  • Distant Diversion +7% Distant Diversion +7%: +7% Enhancement bonus to decreased threat generated from ranged damage.

Cloak of the Hunter
  • Relentless FuryRelentless Fury: While this item is equipped, any killing blows you strike against enemies may drive you into a furious rage, providing a 5% Enchantment damage bonus to your melee, ranged and unarmed attacks for 30 seconds. Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.
  • Exceptional Healing Amplification +14Healing Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming positive energy healing by +14 (Exceptional bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • Quality Deception +2Quality Deception +2: +2 Quality bonus to hit and +3 to damage for any hit that would qualify as a sneak attack.
  • Quality Seeker +3Quality Seeker +3: Provides a +3 Quality bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +3 Quality bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).
  • Huntmaster's FavorHuntmaster's Favor:
    • 2 Pieces Equipped: +3 Artifact bonus to Sneak Attack Dice

    • 4 Pieces Equipped: +15% Artifact bonus to damage vs the Helpless

Legendary Dread Stalker's Cloak
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • Dexterity +14 Dexterity +14: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +14 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.

Cloak of Night (level 32)
  • Invisibility GuardInvisibility Guard: This item has a chance of granting you temporary invisibility when you are hit by foes. The invisibility will not be removed when you attack or take damage, but it will wear off after 10 seconds.
  • Enhanced GhostlyEnhanced Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 15% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • DeathblockDeathblock: The wearer of this item is immune to all death spells and magical death effects.
  • Nightmare GuardNightmare Guard: This item has a chance to terrorizing foes that hit you, applying a Mind Thrust effect, when you are hit by them (dealing 5d8 force damage, Will save vs. Enchantments negates). It may also expose your foes to their greatest fears, acting as a Phantasmal Killer spell.
  • Dodge +14% Dodge +14%: +14% Enhancement bonus to Dodge.
  • DRDamage Reduction 15/Good: Reduces physical damage by 15, except from Good attacks. 15/Good

  • False Life +54 False Life +54: +54 Enhancement bonus to hit points.

  • Quality Resistance +2Quality Resistance +2: Passive: +2 Quality bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
  • Lifesealed +36Lifesealed +36: You are immune to magical effects that cause instant death. In addition, you have a +36 enhancement bonus to Negative Energy Absorption.

    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14

    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 32 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Fire Over Morgrave end chest
Page Regalia: Exiled Tactica
  • Undying +112 Undying +112: Bound to service beyond death, you gain a +112 enhancement bonus to your Incapacitation range.
  • Profane Combat Mastery +3Profane Combat Mastery +3: +3 Profane bonus to the DC to resist the character's Trip, Improved Trip, Sunder, Improved Sunder, Stunning Blow, and Stunning Fist attempts.
  • Insightful Armor-Piercing - 11%Insightful Armor-Piercing - 11%: Passive: +11% Insight bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)
  • Legendary Electric StormLegendary Electric Storm: On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit this power will be released, dealing damage to the target and all enemies near it for 30d6 + 90 electric damage.
  • Lost PurposeLost Purpose: This item is missing some parts that made it unique. Perhaps you can fix that at a Cannith Repurposing Station.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness

Page Regalia: Unsanctioned Arcana
  • Turn the PageTurn the Page
    Caster level: 12
    Charges: 5 (5/day)     — 5 Charges (Recharged/Day:5)
  • Insightful Spell Focus Mastery +3Insightful Spell Focus Mastery +3: +3 Insight bonus to the DC of all spells.
  • Quality Spell Focus Mastery +2Quality Spell Focus Mastery +2: +2 Quality bonus to the DC of all spells.
  • Nullmagic GuardNullmagic Guard: On being hit with a spell: There is a small chance that you explode in arcane energies. Foes hit are subject to a silencing effect, preventing their spellcasts and dampening their magical protections for 10 seconds.
  • Lost PurposeLost Purpose: This item is missing some parts that made it unique. Perhaps you can fix that at a Cannith Repurposing Station.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments

Thin Black Cloak
  • Dexterity +1 Dexterity +1: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +1 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
